attributes.comment:
I am concerned with the increase in processing fees. We are in the process of
adopting from China, and have already had to redo some of the paperwork and once
again pay the processing fees due to the length of time it is taking. We have
already paid some fees twice. If there is going to be an increase in the fees,
there should also be an increase in the expiration times for the documents. If
we already are paying the fee twice in many instances due to the documents
expiring, any increase in the fee should also lead to an extension in the amount
of time the document is valid.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Gregory Johnson
